1.0.name: wordpress/link-exchange-true-automatic-link-exchange-trafficfeed
1.0.description:
Use this plugin to control all aspects of your link exchange or link ads (sales and purchses). We are the only ones that give you a range of tools that allow you to do a true automatic link exchange. Just set criteria and system will do everything for you, you can still monitor everything. Read and see video here: http://www.trafficfeed.com/cms/seo-tools-overview/

How to use this plugin?

Within your wordpress admin panel, please Click on Appearance -> Widgets then on the right hand side select where you would like to place TrafficFeed link in, then drag 'TEXT' widget where you would like to use TrafficFeed.
Use shortcode for display link exchanges.
[TF-SHOW show="receive_div"]. For displaying page link exchanges
[TF-SHOW show="receive_dir"]. For displaying Link directory
Click 'Save' after you have included the code, etc As simple as that. If you have any questions or having
